title: Fresh Air Pays Tribute To The 50th Anniversary Of Bloody Sunday
teaser: On March 7, 1965, marchers from Selma, Ala., attempted to cross a bridge to demonstrate in support of voting rights. Selma director Ava DuVernay, John Lewis and J.L. Chestnut reflect on that day.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
